title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: AI-Integrated Projects for Improving EFL Writing in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English grammar and basic writing skills, with experience in science-related roles
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve the ability to draft outlines and complete first drafts of English scientific papers using GPT-3.5-based AI tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can logically structure academic English writing (introduction-methods-results-discussion) by incorporating AI feedback.
Learners reduce common grammatical errors in academic writing by 90% through peer review and analysis of AI-generated examples.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
